channel.title: Help with a few things *UPDATED* *Need a Reply*
channel.description:
Okay, I need help with these problems:
(1) Adding items that my Jungle Demon drops. (Ex: Armadyl Godsword - 11694) (2) Adding a rate at which these items are dropped. (Wanting around 30% rate, please put in TUT if possible) (3) Making the HP of the NPC to around 450.
Please add a MINI-TUT in a comment or point me in the direction of which I add these.

item.title: Help with a few things *UPDATED* *Need a Reply*
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

sorecheeny:

dont got one or dont want to :l sorry i dont have time

It’s alright* all is good mate.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with a few things *UPDATED* *Need a Reply*
item.dc:creator: @Chiller Chiller
item.description:
@Chiller wrote:

[quote=“sorecheeny, post:3, topic:351562”]okay this is what u do
go into config in source and go to npc drops open with note pad. it should show the people and stuff okay so… 1st number is npc id
2nd is item id 3rd is amount 4th is drop rate keep making them and change the item id and rate then to make npc a certain place, go into confic and go to auto spawn and open with note pad and it should show this.

spawn = 496	3090	3244	0	0	0	0	0	1

okay first number is npc id 2nd and 3rd are pos x and pos y all those numbers are the areas u want it to move 2 last 1 dont worry about

[size=14pt]Hope this helped[/size][/quote]
About the rate, what number would be 30% drop rate? 30?

Read full topic
item.source: Help with a few things *UPDATED* *Need a Reply*

item.title: Help with a few things *UPDATED* *Need a Reply*
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

317
autospawn.cfg
spawn = 1472 tab 2899 tab 2723 tab 0 tab 0 tab 0 tab 0 tab 0 tab 1

npcdrops.cfg
//Jungle Demon
npcdrop = 1472 tab 11694 1 tab 30
do the other drops your self

this is 317. correspond it to a 508, becuz I don’t spoonfeed.

Read full topic

go into config in source and go to npc drops open with note pad. it should show the people and stuff okay so… 1st number is npc id
2nd is item id 3rd is amount 4th is drop rate keep making them and change the item id and rate then to make npc a certain place, go into confic and go to auto spawn and open with note pad and it should show this.

okay first number is npc id 2nd and 3rd are pos x and pos y all those numbers are the areas u want it to move 2 last 1 dont worry about

[size=14pt]Hope this helped[/size]
